title: Thriller Film
synopsis: A noir, mysterious thriller film featuring A young detective and a mysterious woman in rainy city street.

shots.title: Shot 1
shots.visual_description: A noir, mysterious scene featuring A young detective and a mysterious woman in rainy city street during night
shots.prompt:
Shot Type: Medium close-up
            Camera Angle: Eye level
            Camera Movement: Static
            Duration: 2.0 seconds
            Location: Police station interrogation room
            Characters: Detective Sarah, Mike Johnson
            Action: Sarah confronts Mike with evidence
            Lighting: Harsh overhead fluorescent lighting
            Composition: Two-shot with Sarah in foreground, Mike in background
            Color Palette: High contrast black and white with blue tint
            Sound Design: Tense silence, distant office sounds
            Emotional Impact: Builds tension and suspicion
            Notes: Focus on facial expressions and body language
shots.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, low resolution, watermark, text, logo, distorted, deformed, ugly, bad anatomy, bright, cheerful, happy, cartoon, anime, childish
